plot: Irie is an unhappy bullied kid. His life starts getting better as his father gets remarried and her daughter moves in.
plot_en: Irie is an unhappy bullied kid. His life starts getting better as his father gets remarried and her daughter moves in.
plot_es: Irie is an unhappy bullied kid. His life starts getting better as his father gets remarried and her daughter moves in.
title: Strawberry on the Shortcake
